verses.verse: כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- When יַכְרִ֞ית <S%H3772><s%> yach-Rit hath cut off יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh When the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> hag-go-Yim, the nations אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whose יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God נֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> no-Ten giveth לְךָ֖ le-Cha אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אַרְצָ֑ם <S%H776><s%> 'ar-Tzam; whose land וִֽירִשְׁתָּ֕ם <S%H3423><s%> vi-rish-Tam thee and thou succeedest וְיָשַׁבְתָּ֥ <S%H3427><s%> ve-ya-shav-Ta them and dwellest בְעָרֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5892><s%> ve-'a-rei-Hem in their cities וּבְבָתֵּיהֶֽם׃ <S%H1004><s%> u-ve-vat-tei-Hem. and in their houses

שָׁל֥וֹשׁ <S%H7969><s%> sha-Loosh three עָרִ֖ים <S%H5892><s%> 'a-Rim cities תַּבְדִּ֣יל <S%H914><s%> tav-Dil Thou shalt separate לָ֑ךְ Lach; בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch for thee in the midst אַרְצְךָ֔ <S%H776><s%> 'ar-tze-Cha, of thy land אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God נֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> no-Ten giveth לְךָ֖ le-Cha לְרִשְׁתָּֽהּ׃ <S%H3423><s%> le-rish-Tah. thee to possess

תָּכִ֣ין <S%H3559><s%> ta-Chin Thou shalt prepare לְךָ֮ le-Cha הַדֶּרֶךְ֒ <S%H1870><s%> had-de-reCh thee a way וְשִׁלַּשְׁתָּ֙ <S%H8027><s%> ve-shil-lash-Ta into three parts אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> ge-Vul and divide the coasts אַרְצְךָ֔ <S%H776><s%> 'ar-tze-Cha, of thy land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which יַנְחִֽילְךָ֖ <S%H5157><s%> yan-chi-le-Cha giveth thee to inherit יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha; thy God וְהָיָ֕ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah become לָנ֥וּס <S%H5127><s%> la-Nus may flee שָׁ֖מָּה <S%H8033><s%> Sham-mah there כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- any רֹצֵֽחַ׃ <S%H7523><s%> ro-Tze-ach. that every slayer

וְזֶה֙ <S%H2088><s%> ve-Zeh now this דְּבַ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> de-Var And this [is] the case הָרֹצֵ֔חַ <S%H7523><s%> ha-ro-Tze-ach, of the slayer אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- who יָנ֥וּס <S%H5127><s%> ya-Nus which shall flee שָׁ֖מָּה <S%H8033><s%> Sham-mah there וָחָ֑י <S%H2425><s%> va-Chai; thither that he may live אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher when יַכֶּ֤ה <S%H5221><s%> yak-Keh Whoso killeth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- רֵעֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H7453><s%> re-'E-hu his neighbour בִּבְלִי־ <S%H1097><s%> biv-li- corruption דַ֔עַת <S%H1847><s%> Da-'at, cunning וְה֛וּא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu he לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not שֹׂנֵ֥א <S%H8130><s%> so-Ne whom he hated ל֖וֹ lo מִתְּמֹ֥ל <S%H8543><s%> mit-te-Mol not in time שִׁלְשֹֽׁם׃ <S%H8032><s%> shil-Shom. past

וַאֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> va-'a-Sher when יָבֹ֨א <S%H935><s%> ya-Vo As when a man goeth אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- with רֵעֵ֥הוּ <S%H7453><s%> re-'E-hu with his neighbour בַיַּעַר֮ <S%H3293><s%> vai-ya-'Ar into the wood לַחְטֹ֣ב <S%H2404><s%> lach-To to hew עֵצִים֒ <S%H6086><s%> 'e-Tzim wood וְנִדְּחָ֨ה <S%H5080><s%> ve-nid-de-Chah fetcheth a stroke יָד֤וֹ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Do and his hand בַגַּרְזֶן֙ <S%H1631><s%> vag-gar-Zen with the axe לִכְרֹ֣ת <S%H3772><s%> lich-Rot to cut down הָעֵ֔ץ <S%H6086><s%> ha-'Etz, the tree וְנָשַׁ֤ל <S%H5394><s%> ve-na-Shal slippeth הַבַּרְזֶל֙ <S%H1270><s%> hab-bar-Zel and the head מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- at הָעֵ֔ץ <S%H6086><s%> ha-'Etz, from the helve וּמָצָ֥א <S%H4672><s%> u-ma-Tza and lighteth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- רֵעֵ֖הוּ <S%H7453><s%> re-'E-hu upon his neighbour וָמֵ֑ת <S%H4191><s%> va-Met; that he die ה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> Hu, he יָנ֛וּס <S%H5127><s%> ya-Nus he shall flee אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אַחַ֥ת <S%H259><s%> 'a-Chat unto one הֶעָרִים־ <S%H5892><s%> he-'a-rim-] of those cities הָאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh] of these וָחָֽי׃ <S%H2425><s%> va-Chai.] and live

פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> pen- otherwise יִרְדֹּף֩ <S%H7291><s%> yir-Dof pursue גֹּאֵ֨ל <S%H1350><s%> go-'El Lest the avenger הַדָּ֜ם <S%H1818><s%> had-Dam of the blood אַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei after that הָרֹצֵ֗חַ <S%H7523><s%> ha-ro-Tze-ach, the manslayer כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- while יֵחַם֮ <S%H3179><s%> ye-Cham is hot לְבָבוֹ֒ <S%H3824><s%> le-va-Vo his heart וְהִשִּׂיג֛וֹ <S%H5381><s%> ve-his-si-Go and overtake כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- inasmuch as יִרְבֶּ֥ה <S%H7235><s%> yir-Beh is long הַדֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> had-De-rech him because the way וְהִכָּ֣הוּ <S%H5221><s%> ve-hik-Ka-hu and slay נָ֑פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> Na-fesh; him וְלוֹ֙ ve-Lo אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein was not מִשְׁפַּט־ <S%H4941><s%> mish-pat- whereas he [was] not worthy מָ֔וֶת <S%H4194><s%> Ma-vet, of death כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> ki since לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo had not שֹׂנֵ֥א <S%H8130><s%> so-Ne he hated ה֛וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he ל֖וֹ lo מִתְּמ֥וֹל <S%H8543><s%> mit-te-Mol him not in time שִׁלְשֽׁוֹם׃ <S%H8032><s%> shil-Shom.] past

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and כֵּ֛ן <S%H3651><s%> ken after that אָנֹכִ֥י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I מְצַוְּךָ֖ <S%H6680><s%> me-tzav-ve-Cha Wherefore I command לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; thee saying שָׁלֹ֥שׁ <S%H7969><s%> sha-Losh three עָרִ֖ים <S%H5892><s%> 'a-Rim cities תַּבְדִּ֥יל <S%H914><s%> tav-Dil Thou shalt separate לָֽךְ׃ Lach. ס sa-Mek

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> ve-'im- If יַרְחִ֞יב <S%H7337><s%> yar-Chiv enlarge יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And if the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- גְּבֻ֣לְךָ֔ <S%H1366><s%> ge-Vul-cha, thy coast כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher which נִשְׁבַּ֖ע <S%H7650><s%> nish-Ba' as he hath sworn לַאֲבֹתֶ֑יךָ <S%H1><s%> la-'a-vo-Tei-cha; unto thy fathers וְנָ֤תַן <S%H5414><s%> ve-Na-tan and give לְךָ֙ le-Cha אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, thee all the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which דִּבֶּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber which he promised לָתֵ֥ת <S%H5414><s%> la-Tet to give לַאֲבֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H1><s%> la-'a-vo-Tei-cha. unto thy fathers

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- if תִשְׁמֹר֩ <S%H8104><s%> tish-Mor If thou shalt keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַמִּצְוָ֨ה <S%H4687><s%> ham-mitz-Vah all these commandments הַזֹּ֜את <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot you לַעֲשֹׂתָ֗הּ <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-so-Tah, to do אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which אָנֹכִ֣י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I מְצַוְּךָ֮ <S%H6680><s%> me-tzav-ve-Cha them which I command הַיּוֹם֒ <S%H3117><s%> hai-yOm thee this day לְאַהֲבָ֞ה <S%H157><s%> le-'a-ha-Vah to love אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God וְלָלֶ֥כֶת <S%H1980><s%> ve-la-Le-chet walk בִּדְרָכָ֖יו <S%H1870><s%> bid-ra-Chav in his ways כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַיָּמִ֑ים <S%H3117><s%> hai-ya-Mim; ever וְיָסַפְתָּ֨ <S%H3254><s%> ve-ya-saf-Ta then shalt thou add לְךָ֥ le-Cha עוֹד֙ <S%H5750><s%> 'Od more שָׁלֹ֣שׁ <S%H7969><s%> sha-Losh three עָרִ֔ים <S%H5892><s%> 'a-Rim, cities עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al besides הַשָּׁלֹ֥שׁ <S%H7969><s%> hash-sha-Losh more for thee beside these three הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh.] these

וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo not יִשָּׁפֵךְ֙ <S%H8210><s%> yish-sha-feCh be not shed דָּ֣ם <S%H1818><s%> dam blood נָקִ֔י <S%H5355><s%> na-Ki, That innocent בְּקֶ֣רֶב <S%H7130><s%> be-Ke-rev in אַרְצְךָ֔ <S%H776><s%> 'ar-tze-Cha, thy land אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God נֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> no-Ten giveth לְךָ֖ le-Cha נַחֲלָ֑ה <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-Lah; thee [for] an inheritance וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah become עָלֶ֖יךָ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-cha and דָּמִֽים׃ <S%H1818><s%> da-Mim. and [so] blood ס sa-Mek

וְכִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ve-chi- if יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh is a אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> 'ish But if any man שֹׂנֵ֣א <S%H8130><s%> so-Ne hate לְרֵעֵ֔הוּ <S%H7453><s%> le-re-'E-hu, his neighbour וְאָ֤רַב <S%H693><s%> ve-'A-rav and lie in wait לוֹ֙ lo וְקָ֣ם <S%H6965><s%> ve-Kam for him and rise up עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav, against וְהִכָּ֥הוּ <S%H5221><s%> ve-hik-Ka-hu against him and smite נֶ֖פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> Ne-fesh him mortally וָמֵ֑ת <S%H4191><s%> va-Met; that he die וְנָ֕ס <S%H5127><s%> ve-Nas and fleeth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אַחַ֖ת <S%H259><s%> 'a-Chat into one הֶעָרִ֥ים <S%H5892><s%> he-'a-Rim cities הָאֵֽל׃ <S%H411><s%> ha-'El. of these

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- shall not תָח֥וֹס <S%H2347><s%> ta-Chos shall not pity עֵֽינְךָ֖ <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-ne-Cha Thine eye עָלָ֑יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav; and וּבִֽעַרְתָּ֧ <S%H1197><s%> u-vi-'ar-Ta him but thou shalt put away דַֽם־ <S%H1818><s%> dam- blood הַנָּקִ֛י <S%H5355><s%> han-na-Ki [the guilt of] innocent מִיִּשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> mi-Yis-ra-'El from Israel וְט֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> ve-Tov good לָֽךְ׃ Lach. ס sa-Mek
